extendedInfo.description: Convert your own photos into jigsaw puzzles!Those who like this popular logical game will surely appreciate our "Jigsaw Puzzles Seasons". Both children and adults will simply love them.We are happy to offer you:- 24 high-resolution images. All images are seamlessly adjusted to the screen size, including Full HD.- 4 categories: Winter, Spring, Summer, Autumn.- 3 difficulty levels. Even a child can cope with the easiest puzzles.Extra functionality allows you:- To vote for your favourite images! We will consider your preferences when updating the app.- To take pictures and immediately convert them into jigsaw puzzles.- To upload images from your mobile device image gallery.The ability to upload images and pictures from your mobile image gallery gives you a chance to create an endless number of jigsaw puzzles. Your children will be so happy when they piece together a puzzle and reveal the picture of their favourite pet or a screenshot of a cartoon they love!As the new versions of our app come out, the lowest rated images based on the voting results will be replaced with new ones.With our new "Jigsaw Puzzles Seasons" app, you can always have access to new cool jigsaw puzzles!!! Enjoy your game!

reviews.title: Zigsaw puzzles
reviews.comment: Iam loving my puzzles,keep it coming!!!!
reviews.author: Joyce Williams

reviews.title: Jigsaw Puzzles Seasons
reviews.comment: I have for a long time lo oked around for a jigsaw puzzle that is not so easy to put together. Today I have found one that is not only fun, but challenging. Any one who enjoys jigsaw puzzles please get this one you will not be disappointed. GREAT WORK!!!! Thank you for taking the time to create this wonderful work of art. AWESOME! JUST TOTALLY AWESOME!!!! THANK YOU, THANK YOU and THANK YOU again and again. If at all possible I would like to install this to my desKtop.  Sincerely, Sheila
reviews.author: Sheila Boyd

reviews.title: JP Seasons
reviews.comment: Force closes every 10 mins and in the middle of my puzzle progress. I am considering uninstalling.
reviews.author: Areneshell Copeland
